name: Match Buster
overview: A low memory, fast running version of Boulder Dash. Originally created by Simon Stelling for the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Development Competition 2012. It may look like a bog standard mini Boulder Dash clone, but it actually features some really clever design mechanics borrowed and inspired from a variety of other games (including Pushcat and Portal), and even an attract mode showing how the game is played! Already excellent, there's still a lot of blank space left in the 16KB rom for additional content making Match Buster another game that I hope will see further post-competition improvements.
